alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rutherford and eastern Williamson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arrington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Smyrna, Brentwood, Nolensville, Thompson`s Station, Eagleville and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 59 and 71. Interstate 24 between mile markers 69 and 72. Interstate 840 between mile markers 29 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
